edu.ncsu.csc216.checkout_simulator.items

Class Cart

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ncsu.csc216.checkout_simulator.items.Cart
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ExpressCart, RegularShoppingCart, SpecialHandlingCart

    public abstract class Cart
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class that establishes basic behavior for Cart objects. Each Cart will be processed at a Register and have fields storing values for the arrival, wait, and process checkout time.
    Author:
    Steven Mayo

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int INITIAL_REGISTER_IDX
      The default index value for all Cart objects that have not selected a checkout line.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Cart(int arrivalTime, int processTime)
      The constructor method for all Cart objects.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods

      int getArrivalTime()
      Returns the arrival time, in seconds, that a Cart object will spend in the shopping area before getting into a register line.
      abstract java.awt.Color getColor()
      Abstract method to be inherited and defined by each Cart type.
      abstract void getInLine(CheckoutRegister[] checkoutRegister)
      Abstract method to be inherited and defined by each Cart type.
      int getProcessTime()
      Returns the number of seconds that a Cart object will wait in a checkout register line.
      int getRegisterIndex()
      Returns the index of the Register that the Cart object has selected for processing.
      int getWaitTime()
      Returns the amount of time in seconds that a Cart object waits in a checkout line before being processed.
      boolean isWaitingInRegisterLine()
      Returns a boolean value to track if a Cart object is currently being processed or still waiting in line.
      void removeFromWaitingLine()
      Removes a completely processed Cart from a Register's checkout line and completes their processing.

      Calculates and sets the amount of time that a Cart will spend waiting in line before processing.

    • Field Detail

      • INITIAL_REGISTER_IDX

        public static final int INITIAL_REGISTER_IDX
        The default index value for all Cart objects that have not selected a checkout line.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Constructor Detail

      • Cart

        public Cart(int arrivalTime,
            int processTime)
        The constructor method for all Cart objects. An arrival time and process time are passed in as arguments for the creation of each Cart object.
        Parameters:
        arrivalTime - Time (seconds) when the cart completes shopping and gets into a Register line.
        processTime - Time (seconds) required for the cart to finish processing once it has reached the front of the Register's line.

    • Method Detail

      • getArrivalTime

        public int getArrivalTime()
        Returns the arrival time, in seconds, that a Cart object will spend in the shopping area before getting into a register line.
        Returns:
        arrivalTime The time that a cart will spend before entering a checkout line.

      • getWaitTime

        public int getWaitTime()
        Returns the amount of time in seconds that a Cart object waits in a checkout line before being processed.
        Returns:
        waitTime The time, in seconds, spent waiting in a checkout line before processing.

      • setWaitTime

        public void setWaitTime(int waitTime)
        Calculates and sets the amount of time that a Cart will spend waiting in line before processing. This method is computed when the cart first enters the checkout line.
        Parameters:
        waitTime - The amount of time that a cart will spend waiting in line before processing.

      • getProcessTime

        public int getProcessTime()
        Returns the number of seconds that a Cart object will wait in a checkout register line.
        Returns:
        processTime The time, in seconds, that a cart waits in at a checkout line.

      • getRegisterIndex

        public int getRegisterIndex()
        Returns the index of the Register that the Cart object has selected for processing.
        Returns:
        registerIndex The index value for the Register that the Cart will be processed by.

      • isWaitingInRegisterLine

        public boolean isWaitingInRegisterLine()
        Returns a boolean value to track if a Cart object is currently being processed or still waiting in line.
        Returns:
        True if the Cart is currently in line for a register and false if the Cart is still shopping or has finished all processing and left the Register line.

      • removeFromWaitingLine

        public void removeFromWaitingLine()
        Removes a completely processed Cart from a Register's checkout line and completes their processing.

      • getInLine

        public abstract void getInLine(CheckoutRegister[] checkoutRegister)
        Abstract method to be inherited and defined by each Cart type. This method will place the Cart at the back of it's chosen Register's checkout line.
        Parameters:
        checkoutRegister - An array containing the available CheckoutRegister objects that a cart can select to checkout from.

      • getColor

        public abstract java.awt.Color getColor()
        Abstract method to be inherited and defined by each Cart type. This method is used for animation purposes and will return the Cart color that is defined by the Cart's specific type.
        Returns:
        Color The type-specific color assigned to the current Cart object.
